message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this unique product at a price of $12000. I think it's a fair price considering its value to you, and I'm confident you'll find it worth every penny.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to sell the product. However, I am only able to pay up to $10000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement that works for both of us.

I understand you're looking to get a good deal, Bob. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $10000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm offering the product to you for $11500. This is the lowest price I'm willing to consider at this point.

I appreciate your offer, Alice. While I understand your position, I'm still unable to meet you at $11500. My maximum budget remains at $10000. I hope we can find a solution that respects my financial limits.
